entry.title: A simple backup scheme for wallet accounts
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around a proposed change in the default encryption algorithm from AES-GCM to CHACHA20. The suggestion emphasizes the significance of integrating this change into the core, highlighting the advantage of not needing to introduce new dependencies solely for this purpose. This proposal underscores a strategic move towards enhancing the security framework without complicating the existing system with additional external libraries or tools. The emphasis on keeping the core lean while adopting a potentially more efficient or secure encryption methodology reflects a thoughtful consideration of both performance and security implications.
